nodes.text: Interstellar Lightspeed Manufacturing (or ILM) was a hyperdrive company and a division of Sacul Industries Group. The company designed the hyperdrive used in the StarSpeeder 1000 spaceliner built by its sister company Sacul Aerospace.
This organization was mentioned only in an advertisement on the video screen found exclusively in the queue of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue at Tokyo Disneyland.
"ILM" is also the initials -- and alternate name -- of Lucasfilm's special effects company, Industrial Light & Magic.
